lexUnit.name: back.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: in the opposite direction from the one that one is facing or travelling towards.

sentence.text: Further along , Simon could see Mr Bishop 's kiosk , abandoned to the elements , its shutters still down , its back door flapping open , banging to and fro in the wind .
